SEARCH
Package complexClasses

Class ComplexMath

java.lang.Object
complexClasses.ComplexMath
public final class ComplexMath extends Object
ComplexObject serves as the parent class for other complex classes, providing a single location for linear algebra functions to be collected and giving universal access to those methods on each complex class.
Since:
29 June 2024
Version:
0.1
Author:
Robert Smith

    • tensorMultiply

      public static ComplexMatrix tensorMultiply(ComplexMatrix firstMatrix, ComplexMatrix secondMatrix)
      Computes the tensor product of the control and target matrices using the provided matrices.
      Parameters:
      firstMatrix - The first matrix.
      secondMatrix - The second matrix.
      Returns:
      A new ComplexMatrix object that is the result of the tensor product.

    • multiplyMatrix

      public static ComplexMatrix multiplyMatrix(ComplexMatrix matrixOne, ComplexMatrix matrixTwo)
      Multiplies two matrices and returns the result as a new matrix.
      Parameters:
      matrixOne - The first matrix.
      matrixTwo - The second matrix.
      Returns:
      A new ComplexMatrix object that is the result of the matrix multiplication.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the matrices have incompatible dimensions for multiplication.

    • addMatrix

      public static ComplexMatrix addMatrix(ComplexMatrix matrixOne, ComplexMatrix matrixTwo)
      Adds two matrices and returns the result as a new matrix.
      Parameters:
      matrixOne - The first matrix.
      matrixTwo - The second matrix.
      Returns:
      A new ComplexMatrix object that is the result of the matrix addition.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the matrices have different dimensions.

    • addComplexNumbers

      public static ComplexNumber addComplexNumbers(ComplexNumber aVec, ComplexNumber bVec)
      Adds two complex numbers.
      Parameters:
      aVec - The first complex number.
      bVec - The second complex number.
      Returns:
      The complex number result of the addition.

    • deriveStateVector

      public static ComplexMatrix deriveStateVector(ComplexMatrix control, ComplexMatrix target)
      Calculates the tensor product of two input qubits to create the state vector used for two-qubit gate application.
      Parameters:
      control - The control qubit.
      target - The target qubit.
      Returns:
      A ComplexNumber[] with length 4, containing the state vector resultant from the tensor multiplication.

    • outerProduct

      public static ComplexMatrix outerProduct(ComplexMatrix vector)
      Multiplies a vector against it's transpose and returns a matrix that is 2*vector.getHeight() wide and tall
      Parameters:
      vector - The input vector, usually a qubit state
      Returns:
      The outer product as matrix

    • getTranspose

      public static ComplexMatrix getTranspose(ComplexMatrix originMatrix)
      Transposes a given matrix.
      Parameters:
      originMatrix - The matrix to transpose.
      Returns:
      A new ComplexMatrix that is the transpose of the original matrix.

    • getConjugateTranspose

      public static ComplexMatrix getConjugateTranspose(ComplexMatrix originMatrix)
      Computes the conjugate transpose (Hermitian transpose) of a given matrix.
      Parameters:
      originMatrix - The matrix to compute the conjugate transpose of.
      Returns:
      A new ComplexMatrix that is the conjugate transpose of the original matrix.
